entry.title: Ottawa Fears Vaccine Protest Has Morphed Into an Occupation
entry.content: A weeklong demonstration against Covid-19 vaccine mandates in the Canadian capital has forced businesses to close, frayed residents’ nerves and strangled swaths of the city’s core.

entry.title: Dismal Russian Record in Occupied Eastern Ukraine Serves as Warning
entry.content: The areas, once engines of the Ukrainian economy, are now impoverished, depopulated enclaves that increasingly rely on Russian subsidies to survive. It’s what many fear could happen to the rest of the country if Vladimir Putin carries out a broader invasion.
